markdown:
| icon           = poe2 rolled_letter icon.png
| description    = Hello lovesome,

While I am disappointed you've yet to come see me - I do understand. My little Sirens tell me you've been quite busy bloodying the Deadfire, for which I can certainly appreciate. Or perhaps my first missive to you was merely lost at sea?

Either way.

I hear you've got a deal (another one, really?) going on with Furrante to muck around in the mess that is Crookspur Island. Before you go sailing in to do that cock-rot's bidding, come and have a chat with me, will you? I've got a proposition for you I think you'll find wickedly enticing.

I'll reserve our finest berth for [Player Ship] at Fort Deadlight's docks.

Your most ruthless but truthful friend (in possibility, should you choose), Captain Aeldys

PS - Be a dear and bring me some candied nuts, aye?
| added_in       = poe2
